Literature.Title: A Genomics-Based Approach Identifies a Thioviridamide-Like Compound with Selective Anticancer Activity
Literature.Author: Frattaruolo L, Lacret R, Cappello AR, Truman AW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=24µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>48µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>48µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>48µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>48µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>48µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=0.048µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=0.059µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(IC50=0.072µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=0.050µM),Human Pancreatic adenocarcinoma PA-TU-8988T(IC50=0.065µM)
